business_identity.current_stage: Solo freelancer transitioning to agency model

location.positioning_strategy: Dual presence - Portland & Kentucky markets, but do NOT highlight the move from Portland
location.marketing_approach: Position as available in both markets without emphasizing relocation

business_identity.team_size: Solo operation with network of collaborators

founder.name: Barrett Shutt
founder.background: 7+ years as professional photographer/creative director, transitioned from finance career
founder.personality_notes: Self-described as 'least organized creative', collaborative, open to expertise, authentic communicator

origin_story.narrative: The idea for Playground Studios was born during a walk through a Portland neighborhood. Watching kids play on a playground sparked a memory of those carefree days when anything seemed possible, when imagination had no limits, and when dreams were the only currency that mattered. The playground represents where we dreamed, created, and imagined—a space for boundless creativity that Playground Studios channels into professional content creation.

step_1.name: Play on Set
step_1.meaning: Blue sky imagination. No limits. No budget. Dream. This is where ideas are born.

step_2.name: Get in the Box
step_2.meaning: Take the ideas and bring them into frame. Create within the borders. Leverage limitations to fuel focus.

step_3.name: Go Home
step_3.meaning: Leave with a product you are proud of. Deliver work that exceeds expectations.

primary.name: Brand/Lifestyle Photography
primary.description: Commercial photography for brands and lifestyle campaigns

primary.name: Videography & Video Production
primary.description: Branded content, commercials, social media video
primary.priority: PRIMARY (limited portfolio at launch due to legal constraints)

secondary.name: Creative Development
secondary.description: Concept development, story building, brand positioning, mood boards

full_service_offering: Creative Development (concept, story, positioning, mood boards)
Production (commercials, branded content, UGC/social, film, aerial, studio, photography)
Post-Production (editing, VFX, color grading, SFX, sound mixing, retouching)

positioning.value_proposition: We cater every project with honesty, efficiency and purpose. Making Content is secondary, finding purpose is primary.

differentiators.evidence: Contrasts with 'big agencies' with many hurdles
Flexible pricing vs rigid agency structures

differentiators.claim: Nimble operations - no hurdles to jump over
differentiators.evidence: Solo/small team enables faster decisions, direct client access
End goal is taking ideas and bringing them to reality

market_position.current: Freelancer transitioning to boutique production studio
market_position.target: Recognized small production company working with major brands
market_position.tier: Mid-market (between solo freelancers and large agencies)

pricing.positioning: Quality mid-market - premium results without enterprise agency pricing

direct_competitors.name: Rabithaus
direct_competitors.note: Founder knows personally, sometimes feels competitive pressure

aspirational_references.name: Photon
aspirational_references.relationship: High-end production reference, acknowledged scale difference

negative_references: Large agencies (bureaucracy, inflexibility, too many hurdles)

personality.desired_reaction: Inspired, creative, and think 'wow this company is super sick'

serious_playful.note: But visual execution should be 'mature playful'

color_palette.approach: Clean, neutral palette with white background and black typography

visual_direction.typography_preference: Straightforward, mature fonts. Preference for bold typography but not overly playful
visual_direction.design_style: Linear, straight edges preferred over rounded/curved. Clean, minimal design.
visual_direction.logo_status: In development - 3 concepts explored, none finalized. Direction: less playful, more abstract, more mature

design_inspiration.name: Gym Class
design_inspiration.what_to_borrow: Production company energy, dynamic content, bold typography

design_inspiration.name: Bandit Running
design_inspiration.what_to_borrow: Straightforward font with subtly curved icon, brand storytelling

target_audience.summary: Brands and hospitality businesses looking to elevate their digital presence with content that converts. They care about branding, increasing client rapport, and boosting sales.
decision_makers: Agencies (creative/marketing agencies hiring for client work)
pain_points: Not knowing how to take an idea and make it a reality

website_goals.goal: Create centralized brand platform that attracts and builds clients

business_goals_5_year: Build company with retaining clients and team
Shoot for major brands (Sazerac, Malbon Golf, 7 Eleven Golf)
Expand into clothing, branding studio, design
Create life of freedom and flexibility

success_metrics.gap_flag: HIGH PRIORITY - No quantifiable metrics defined

project_goals.confidence: STATED for goals, MISSING for metrics

content_limitations: Video portfolio limited due to legal usage rights from pre-Playground work
operational: Wants to self-manage routine updates post-launch
Geographic transition (Portland to Kentucky) needs strategy
File organization in progress (compressing images for web)

contradictions_flagged.conflict: Brand personality marked 'Playful' but logo feedback requests 'less playful, more mature'
Relocated to Kentucky but maintains Portland clients
contradictions_flagged.resolution: RESOLVED - Dual presence (Portland + Kentucky), do NOT highlight the move

contradictions_flagged.conflict: Copy uses 'We' throughout but currently solo operation
